content.text: I can see the issue - the SessionStart hook is using `/hooks/session_start.py` but it should use the full path `.claude/hooks/session_start.py`. Let me fix this:
Fixed the session_start.py path to use `.claude/hooks/session_start.py` instead of `/hooks/session_start.py`.
